# Membership

## Become a Tenderloin Museum Member: Show Your Love of Our Neighborhood!

As a member of the Tenderloin Museum, you’ll be joining a community of allies who care deeply about our neighborhood. From the heart of the Tenderloin, our dedicated staff and volunteers uncover and preserve important San Francisco history, present affordable artistic and educational programming, and encourage a more cohesive, resilient, and successful community. Year after year, our members play a critical role in supporting this work.

If you become a member at the Friend to Outsiders, Neighborhood Pillar, Advocate for Equality, Local Landmark, or Tenderloin Pioneer levels, you instantaneously join North American Reciprocal Museum Association (NARM), an affiliation of almost 900 arts, historical, and cultural institutions across North America. <https://narmassociation.org/map>. 

BECOME A MEMBER TODAY 

Renew your membership 

* * *

### New Membership @ TLM

Membership, reimagined: there are now more options for joining and added benefits at every level. All TLM Memberships are fully tax-deductible.

* * *

## Starving Artist — $45

 _(Artists inspire the community, discover possibilities under challenging circumstances, confront painful subjects, and spur meaningful dialogue. Even on a budget, they create.)_  
  
For students, artists, and locals:

  * Free year-round admission, plus 10% off all retail purchases

  * Free admission to one Tenderloin Museum public program

### TENDERLOIN  
MUSEUM

[398 Eddy Street  
(@ Leavenworth)  
San Francisco, CA 94102](https://www.google.com/maps/place/398+Eddy+St,+San+Francisco,+CA+94102/@37.7838734,-122.4163721,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x8085809012afa98f:0x55f6f8a0751d00c2!8m2!3d37.7838734!4d-122.4141834)  
  
[info@tenderloinmuseum.org](mailto:info@tenderloinmuseum.org)  
(415) 351-1912  
  
**Hours** : Tuesday - Saturday  
10:00AM - 5:00PM

### ADMISSION

**Adults** : $10  
**Students & Seniors**: $6  
**Youth** (Ages 13 to 21): $6  
**Children** (Ages 12 & under): FREE  
**Art Gallery** :**** Free

TLM participates in [**Museums for All**](https://museums4all.org/about/), offering FREE general admission (with a valid Snap/EBT card + ID)

**Walking Tours** : We offer a variety of historical neighborhood walking tours. They’re usually scheduled on Saturdays at 2 PM and run approximately 90 minutes to two hours. Please check the [**Upcoming Public Programs page**](/upcoming-public-programs) for more information and to purchase tickets.

**CLOSED on HOLIDAYS:**  
New Year’s Day  
Juneteenth  
Independence Day  
Thanksgiving / Day After Thanksgiving (Native American Heritage Day)  
Christmas Eve / Christmas / Boxing Day (Day After Christmas)  ...
